DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , observational study describe pregnancy outcome among HIV-1 uninfected pregnant woman take emtricitabine ( FTC ) /tenofovir disoproxil fumarate ( TDF ) ( TruvadaÂ® ) pre-exposure prophylaxis ( PrEP ) indication nest Antiretroviral Pregnancy Registry ( APR ) .
